author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Paratek Pharmaceuticals Announces Proposed Private Offering Of $125 Mln Of Convertible Senior Subordinated Notes Due 2024
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Paratek Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* PARATEK PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF $125 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE 2024
* PARATEK PHARMACEUTICALS-INTENDS TO USE PROCEEDS, TOGETHER WITH EXISTING CAPITAL RESOURCES, TO FUND ONGOING AND FUTURE CLINICAL STUDIES OF OMADACYCLINE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
